text.section: A person may not represent any uncertified commodity as certified under this subtitle.
In addition to the denial, suspension, or revocation of a certificate issued under this subtitle, the Secretary may impose a civil penalty of not more than $1,000 for a violation of this section.
Each uncertified commodity represented as certified constitutes a separate violation of this section.
Penalties collected by the Secretary under this section shall be paid into the General Fund of the State.
